model.groovebox

Interface GrooveBoxContentManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GrooveBoxModel

    public interface GrooveBoxContentManager
    The classes that implements this interface are able to manage the datastructure of a groove box
    Author:
    Matteo Gabellini

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getSequence

        java.util.Optional<javax.sound.midi.Sequence> getSequence()
        Take the midi sequence that corresponding to the groove box table
        Returns:
        an Optional that may contains the groove sequence

      • changeCellState

        void changeCellState(int rowIndex,
                     int columnIndex)
        Change the state of the cell specified by the parameters
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - the index of the Groove table row
        columnIndex - the index of the Groove table column

      • getCellState

        boolean getCellState(int rowIndex,
                     int columnIndex)
        Take the state of a cell
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - the index of the Groove table row
        columnIndex - the index of the Groove table column
        Returns:
        true if the cell is active or false

      • resetContent

        void resetContent()
        Reset the content of the groove box
